title: Checking Assumptions aND promoting responsibility In smart Development projects
objective: This project will study aspects of the 'smart' agenda in which practitioners from the Social and Human Sciences (SSH) offer unique and valuable insights of relevance to innovators and researchers in the ICT - LEIT[1] areas. Centred on topics concerning of users, design, digital rights and critical infrastructures, CANDID will engage SSH and ICT - LEIT researchers in ëextended peer communicationsí aiming at Responsible Innovation.
participants: VRIJE UNIVERSITEIT BRUSSEL;FUNDACIO PER A LA UNIVERSITAT OBERTA DE CATALUNYA;UNIVERSITY OF SURREY;THE UNIVERSITY OF EDINBURGH

995992024.orgName: FUNDACIO PER A LA UNIVERSITAT OBERTA DE CATALUNYA
